data.eml:eml: Redescription of some poorly known species of Cytaea Keyserling, 1882 (Araneae: Salticidae), with new synonymies

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Patoleta, Barbara M., Trębicki, Łukasz (2015): Redescription of some poorly known species of Cytaea Keyserling, 1882 (Araneae: Salticidae), with new synonymies. Zootaxa 3949 (4): 555-566, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3949.4.5
